text: [[col:green]]Fund [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_nordland/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Nordland so they can wage a war against [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_middenland/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Middenland. Sends one Landship to Salzenmund to help their efforts.[[/col]]

[[col:green]]Fund [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_middenland/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Middenland so they can wage a war against [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_empire/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Reikland. Sends one Landship to Middenheim to help their efforts.[[/col]]
[[col:green]]Fund [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_brt_bretonnia/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Couronne so they can wage a war against [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_empire/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Reikland.[/col]]

[[col:green]]Fund [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_wissenland/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Wissenland so they can wage a war against [[img:ui/flags/wh_main_emp_empire/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Reikland. Sends one Landship to Nuln to help their efforts.[[/col]]
Gained access to the Guilded Route
